animation_direction=”left”]

Our Philosophy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_direction=”left”]

Life’s most important lessons are first learned on the playground and we carry that shared experience into our client work.

The imagination, collaboration and teamwork that made magic then guides our process, helping you deliver dining experiences that wow your guests.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/sand-2548132_1920.jpg” title_text=”sand-2548132_1920″ align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” module_id=”new_concepts” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ custom_margin=”-3px|||||” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”We spin familiar concepts to revitalize traditional dining” text_orientation=”center” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.41)” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_align=”center” title_font_size=”52px” title_line_height=”1.2em” subhead_font_size=”26px” subhead_line_height=”1.5em” background_image=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/paula-vermeulen-URjZkhqsuBk-unsplash-scaled.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”25vh||25vh||false|false”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”124px||200px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Our Mission Area” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ min_height=”535px” custom_margin=”1px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left”]

New Concepts

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||-39px|||” custom_padding=”||149px|||” animation_direction=”left”]Playground Hospitality focuses on concept clarity, connecting the design, atmosphere, menus and standard operating procedures to deliver a consistent guest experience.  

Our concepts reflect your brand personality through food, atmosphere and service. 

Working with your design and architecture teams, we shepherd the development process to ensure the integrity of the concept.

 

 [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/paula-vermeulen-URjZkhqsuBk-unsplash-1024×681.jpg” title_text=”paula-vermeulen-URjZkhqsuBk-unsplash” _builder_version=”4.4.6″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 02 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ custom_margin=”|auto|0px|auto||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

Concept Design

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

We work with you to design a restaurant from ideation to reality – including everything from market segmentation and brand development to  real estate strategy and architecture.

 

      • Concept Clarity + Design
      • Competitive Analysis
      • Existing Concept Reformulation
      • Demographic Profile Development
      • Business Model Design
      • Brand + Architectural Design
      • Implementation Planning
      • Ongoing Support + Project Management

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image Operations

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_direction=”left”]

Your bottom line benefits from our decades of hands-on operating experience.

Our recommendations are practical, immediately actionable and measurably effective. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Page-14-Image-66-1024×659.png” title_text=”Page-14-Image-66″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 02 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ custom_margin=”|auto|0px|auto||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

Facilities and Operations

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

We’ll connect the dots for a superior guest experience, from staffing to assisting with facility design.

  • HR Evaluation and Hiring
  • Standards and Training
  • Atmosphere + Interior Design Consulting
  • Kitchen Consulting + Technology Improvements
  • Food and Beverage Connection
  • Quality Control and Standardization

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.66)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

    Restaurant Consulting

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_direction=”left”]

    Maintain your mystique with advice that recharges your concept before traffic wanes. We can spot a declining restaurant before your guests do.

    An ongoing relationship with us keeps your concept competitive and your staff engaged.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/andres-medecigo-fqLYXaAqKZ4-unsplash-scaled.jpg” title_text=”andres-medecigo-fqLYXaAqKZ4-unsplash” _builder_version=”4.5.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 02 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ min_height=”517px” custom_margin=”|auto|-2px|auto||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|11px|0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

    Custom Consulting

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

    Rediscover the soul of your restaurant, streamline operations, stay on-trend or better define your guest experience.

     

    • Trend-Opportunity Identification
    • Creative Menu Development
    • Comprehensive Customer Touch Point / Experience Design
    • Existing Concept Re-positioning / Re-branding
    • Strategic Marketing + PR Advisory
    • Operations Refinement

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/toa-heftiba-nIUY1Y-43Mw-unsplash.jpg” title_text=”toa-heftiba-nIUY1Y-43Mw-unsplash” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_margin=”-56px||-100px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_slide=”8%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”80px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 01 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_margin=”0px|auto|250px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”150px|0px|0px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Page-1-Image-7.png” title_text=”Page-1-Image-7″ force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||40px” custom_padding_tablet=”|||0px” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”8%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left”]

    Restaurant Assessment

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%”]

    We’ll perform an all-around assessment to keep your restaurant fresh while ensuring that its underlying character and points of difference shine through the guest experience.

    • Target Audience Evaluation
    • Brand Narrative + Positioning
    • Guest Experience Evaluation
    • Brand-Driven Chef-to-Concept Alignment

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” module_id=”business_consulting” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ custom_margin=”-3px|||||”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Objective analysis to meaningfully improve your bottom line” text_orientation=”center” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.41)” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ title_level=”h2″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_align=”center” title_font_size=”52px” title_line_height=”1.2em” subhead_font_size=”26px” subhead_line_height=”1.5em” background_image=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/ben-hershey-fnRKVPx5_xY-unsplash-scaled.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”25vh||25vh||false|false”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Mission Section” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ custom_margin=”-2px|||||” custom_padding=”104px|||||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Our Mission Area” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”1px|auto|138px|auto||” custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

    Business Advice

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_direction=”left”]

    Our experts partner with owners and developers to work through the economic fundamentals that ultimately determine success.

    Playground Hospitality sharpens your investment narrative with financial modeling, P&L analysis and pro forma development.

    We’ve helped restaurants adapt to challenges before and know when and how to shift priorities.

     

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/ben-hershey-fnRKVPx5_xY-unsplash-1024×643.jpg” title_text=”ben-hershey-fnRKVPx5_xY-unsplash” _builder_version=”4.4.6″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_margin=”-34px||-225px||false|false” custom_padding=”11px||100px|||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 02 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ custom_margin=”|auto|291px|auto||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

    Business Strategy

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

    We’ll help you find new revenue streams to complement your brand, or we’ll help you break into a new market with your existing concept.

     

    • Feasibility Studies
    • In-Depth Market Analysis
    • Strategic Positioning for Franchises Entering New Markets
    • Real Estate Strategy
    • Real Estate Selection + Lease Negotiation
    • Tenant Search + Selection

background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

    Development Support

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_direction=”left”]

    Developers call on Playground Hospitality to evaluate hospitality tenants and define dining market segments. Working in partnership with the development team, Playground Hospitality delivers actionable recommendations that limit risk, create value, and maximize revenue potential. 

     

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://playgroundhospitality.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/pexels-pixabay-159358-scaled.jpg” title_text=”pexels-pixabay-159358″ _builder_version=”4.5.3″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_margin=”-34px||-225px||false|false” custom_padding=”11px||100px|||” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Feature 02 Area” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ background_color=”#453759″ min_height=”622px” custom_margin=”|auto|278px|auto||” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” padding_tablet=”0px|0px|0px|0px” padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Lato||||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off”]

    Concept Assessment

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off”]

    Playground Hospitality understands that restaurants are a critical amenity for retail, residential and commercial properties. As a strategic partner, we evaluate dining options for your project and deliver actionable recommendations. 

    • Projected pro forma and P&L
    • Market factors and positioning 
    • Competitive set analysis
    • Brand strengths and opportunities
    • Review quality, appearance, and taste profiles
    • Overall guest experience
    • Price/value correlations

       

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image custom_margin=”||15px|” custom_padding=”|||” animation_direction=”left”]

    Concept Creation

    [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” max_width=”525px” module_alignment=”left” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_flip=”20%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%”]

    Developers add us to the project team when they plan to own and operate restaurants. We enhance profitability with optimized concepts and operational advice.

    • Pro forma and budget analysis

    • Concept clarity statement

    • Project positioning and marketing plan

    • Menu development and design 

    • Identify and recruit operator

    • Define layout of physical space 

    • Equipment and technology

    • Bar and kitchen organization 

    • Management training

    • Employee training

    • Quarterly audits
